metadata.name: Envy and Gratitude flw$koa
metadata.description:
All materials for the video are abstract plant and flower forms, stripe, and grid images generated by p5js.
By moving these images vertically in multiple layers and creating repetitive effects, the work explores the possibility of flatness between digital art and Gen art.

This work was minted for Crypto Art Fes 2022 to be held in Japan.
The year 2022 may be a difficult time for crypto and NFT, but such a Fes was held. I would like to note that many people are working hard to explore the possibilities of NFT and to create.
These are days full of envy & gratitude. haha

#p5js #aftereffect
